TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Noob's "working" Space Shuttle

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody, I am new to KSP. I bought the game a week ago on Steam. I've been playing a lot since then. My first goal was to understand the building mechanism of KSP. I have been making a lot of spacecraft just for testing. My latest creation was this space shuttle. It works great but has some minor issues with the decouplers. I am unable to detach the main tank when I want and I don't want to change it to a smaller one. As you can see in this video.

Do you have any idea of how to solve the problem?

Thanks for your support.

Download: http://www./?z5dw904mquh0d4h
